text:
Walmart Labs | Senior Backend Engineer | Carlsbad, CA | ONSITE | Full Time Join the Optimization Tools Team in Carlsbad, CA and help WalmartLabs build the next generation AB testing platform that runs experiments within a multi-billion dollar business. We're looking for motivated, smart engineers that love big challenges and big data. Mainly Java based backend, Node.js frontend; Spark/Hadoop experience a plus.

APPLY: https://careers.walmart.com/us/jobs/816082BR-senior-software...

or email me if you want to discuss role further: atang@walmartlabs.com
